package-info.name: Numbering Tools
package-info.description: Numbering Tools allows you to insert sequential numbers or characters at the cursor position or vertical selection.
package-info.author: HippoEDIT.com

install.readme: This will install Numbering Tools plugin for HippoEDIT.

uninstall.readme: This will uninstall Numbering Tools plugin for HippoEDIT.
